CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(ActiveServicesCtrl__c, '1'), IMAGE(IF($User.UITheme='Theme3', '/sfsites/c', '') & $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.Service1.URL__c, $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.Service1.AlternateText__c, 30, 30), '') & IF(INCLUDES(ActiveServicesCtrl__c, '2'), IMAGE(IF($User.UITheme='Theme3', '/sfsites/c', '') & $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.Service2.URL__c, $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.Service2.AlternateText__c, 30, 30), '') & IF(INCLUDES(ActiveServicesCtrl__c, '3'), IMAGE(IF($User.UITheme='Theme3', '/sfsites/c', '') & $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.Service3.URL__c, $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.Service3.AlternateText__c, 30, 30), '') & IF(INCLUDES(ActiveServicesCtrl__c, '4'), IMAGE(IF($User.UITheme='Theme3', '/sfsites/c', '') & $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.Service4.URL__c, $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.Service4.AlternateText__c, 30, 30), '') & IF(INCLUDES(ActiveServicesCtrl__c, '5'), IMAGE(IF($User.UITheme='Theme3', '/sfsites/c', '') & $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.Service5.URL__c, $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.Service5.AlternateText__c, 30, 30), '')
CustomField.label: Servizi attivi
